summary: The module implements an analysis pass for the Qiskit transpiler that evaluates a directed acyclic graph (DAG) representation of a quantum circuit to determine whether it has reached a stable configuration with no further changes, storing the outcome as a boolean indicator.
business_intent: Enable transpilation workflows to detect convergence of iterative circuit transformations, allowing the compiler to halt further passes once the DAG no longer changes, thereby saving computational resources and ensuring efficient circuit optimization.
